title: Couscous Salad with Feta, Pine Nuts and Cucumber
ingredients: ['475ml water', '230g couscous', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 1/2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '120ml olive oil', '1 cucumber, seeded and chopped', '110g crumbled feta cheese', '6 spring onions, chopped', '20g chopped fresh parsley', '4 tablespoons toasted pine nuts']
